name: Deepsea Penguin
description:
Made for LD48: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deepsea-penguin

A Shoot'em up about a brave penguin that must go deep into the abyss to vanquish the evil pink whale.

CONTROLS:

AD/ARROW KEYS : to move

Left click: to shoot

P/ESC: to pause

Programming and music by MZ Dino

Art by Pearl_Drongo
